jobs.title: Substitute Bus Driver Trainee
jobs.status: On-Call/As NeededMinimum QualificationsMinimum age of 21 years.Have no more than 100 points recorded on past driving record.  No more than two at-fault accidents, two citations, or a combination of one at-fault accident and one citation, in a 24 month period.Hold and maintain a Utah Commercial Drivers License.  Driver Training will be provided if candidate needs to obtain the Utah Commercial Drivers License.The salary for this position is assigned to the BD Salary ScheduleAFTER completion of training.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkBD Salary Schedule.APPLICANTS ARE REQUIRED TO ATTACH/UPLOAD A COPY OF THEIR CURRENT DRIVING RECORD WITH THE APPLICATIONA copy of the driving record can be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles.Attachment(s):Bus Driver & Sub Bus Driver.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Head Boys Wrestling Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Boys Wrestling Coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Mike Bair, at mike.bair@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Health and Safety Assistant
jobs.status: Part Time, 10 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:High school graduation or other equivalent, (i.e., GED, college, technical or trade school, foreign equivalency, etc.).  Experience working with children.  Medical experience or training and clerical experience preferred.Must hold and maintain the following certificates:*Current First Aid certificate from the American Heart Association, American Red Cross, or other similar organization.*Current Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR)/Automated External Defibrillator (AED)certification from the American Heart Association, American Red Cross, or other similar organization.Certifications must be maintained for the duration of the assignment. jobs.title: Registered Behavior Technician
jobs.status: Part Time, 35 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEAssociate's degreeor48 semester hours from an accredited college/universityorpassing results on an approved Paraprofessional Assessment.Consideration will be given to individuals with equivalent work experience specific to working with students with emotional/behavioral disabilities.CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSMust have a Registered Behavior Technician (RBT) Certification issued by the Behavior Analyst Certification Board (BACB).Will be required to complete the following training within 12 months of contract start date:WCSD Intensive Behavior Intervention (IBI) Training Level IWCSD Intensive Behavior Intervention (IBI) Training Level IIThe salary for this position is $27.69 per hour.Attachment(s):Registered Behavior Technician.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Learning Coach
jobs.status: Full Time, 1 FTEMinimum Requirements:An Active Professional level Utah Teaching License.  ESL endorsement would be beneficial.Must have successfully completed a minimum of 3 years general classroom teaching experience.  Candidates with WCSD teaching experience are preferred.As per the Utah State Board of Education, completion of LETRS training is required for all elementary learning coaches.  Starting in the 2023-24 school year, completion of the USBE Instructional Coaching Endorsement and WCSD Teacher Leader Endorsement are recommended within the first 3 years of service in this role.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):TSA Learning Coach.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
